offer-state.description: Current state of the offer for the product.

snapshot-date.description: Date and time when the snapshot of the data was taken.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for the product.

fnsku.description: Fulfillment Network SKU (FNSKU) for the product.

asin.description: Unique identifier for the ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number).

estimated-avg-sns-discount-next-8-weeks.description: Estimated average discount on Subscribe & Save units for the next 8 weeks.

product-name.description: Name of the product associated with the ASIN.

country.description: Country for which the forecast data is applicable.

active-subscriptions.description: Number of active subscriptions for the ASIN in the specified country.

week-1-start-date.description: Start date and time for week 1 of the forecast period.

scheduled-sns-units-week-1.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 1.

scheduled-sns-units-week-2.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 2.

scheduled-sns-units-week-3.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 3.

scheduled-sns-units-week-4.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 4.

scheduled-sns-units-week-5.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 5.

scheduled-sns-units-week-6.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 6.

scheduled-sns-units-week-7.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 7.

scheduled-sns-units-week-8.description: Number of scheduled Subscribe & Save units for week 8.

dataEndTime.description: End time for the forecast data, indicated in date format.
